
                            
                            <p>说是受邀，她这个入金5万3日达标规则，怎么后面又每天日终就小于5000是什么个意思？<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/155306tmpwtybgpmmybpjw.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/07/155306tmpwtybgpmmybpjw.png"> <br> </p><p class="pl">个人感觉就是垃圾，规定不能是活期余额，只能买理财</p><p></p>
